effect_size: Very large for pain (d=1.38), large for radiographic stability (d=1.12)
participants: 108 adults with erosive hand OA (radiographic confirmation)
notes: Cannabidiol for Erosive Hand Osteoarthritis: A Randomized Controlled Trial
abstract: CBD: AUSCAN pain reduced 54% (11.2 → 5.1), radiographic progression 0.4 units vs Placebo: pain reduced 18%, progression 1.8 units; p<0.001
